Work Adjustment and Retraining Notification (WARN) Log Year 2024 - Division of Workforce Development & Adult Learning

To file a WARN, please send an email to dlwdalWARN-labor@maryland.gov

If you do not fall under the WARN Act but would like to utilize our free services and assistance, please use the link below to notify us of your dislocation event.

Employers - Report a Dislocation Event

Update on the Economic Stabilization Act:

The Economic Stabilization Act was enacted under Article II, § 17(c) of the Maryland Constitution on May 30, 2021 and the Department of Labor is actively working to develop regulations that facilitate implementation. The draft regulations have been posted for public comment here. Comments may be sent to Dylan McDonough, Policy Analyst, Maryland Department of Labor, 1100 N Eutaw Street, Baltimore, MD 21201, or call 410-767-1890, or e-mail to dylan.mcdonough@maryland.gov. Comments will be accepted through January 16, 2024. A public hearing has not been scheduled.
